msg: When WS-N is used with CXF in OSGi, wire in the jmx management and make sure it uses
a bundle specific bus instead of the global Bus.  Restore testing with
the RI which apparently has been broken for a while.

author: rajith
msg: QPID-3884 Applying a patch by Kevin Conner.
The message-acks are now sent when we "end" the transaction as opposed
to sending them synchronously after each message.
